parts.text:
Magpie
```json
{
  "application": "Magpie",
  "description": "A collection of scripts for running Hadoop and Spark on traditional HPC systems.",
  "software_requirements": {
    "hadoop": {
      "version": "3.3.6",
      "setup_type": "YARN",
      "home": "${HOME}/hadoop-${HADOOP_VERSION}",
      "local_dir": "/tmp/${USER}/hadoop",
      "daemon_heap_max": "1000",
      "namenode_heap_max": "2000",
      "environment_extra_path": "${HOME}/hadoop-my-environment",
      "job": "terasort",
      "max_tasks_per_node": "8",
      "default_map_tasks": "8",
      "default_reduce_tasks": "8",
      "child_heap_size": "2048",
      "child_map_heap_size": "2048",
      "child_reduce_heap_size": "4096",
      "child_map_container_buffer": "256",
      "child_reduce_container_buffer": "512",
      "mapreduce_slowstart": "0.05",
      "container_memory": "32768",
      "vmem_check": "false",
      "pmem_check": "false",
      "compression": "no",
      "io_sort_factor": "10",
      "io_sort_mb": "100",
      "parallel_copies": "10",
      "terasort_size": "50000000",
      "teragen_map_count": "4",
      "terasort_reducer_count": "4",
      "terasort_clear_cache": "yes",
      "terasort_output_replication": "1",
      "terasort_run_terachecksum": "no",
      "terasort_run_teravalidate": "no",
      "decommission_hdfs_node_size": "8",
      "filesystem_mode": "rawnetworkfs",
      "local_filesystem_blocksize": "33554432",
      "hdfs_replication": "3",
      "hdfs_blocksize": "134217728",
      "hdfs_path": "/ssd/${USER}/hdfs",
      "hdfs_path_clear": "yes",
      "hdfsoverlustre_path": "/lustre/${USER}/hdfsoverlustre/",
      "hdfsoverlustre_remove_locks": "yes",
      "hdfsovernetworkfs_path": "/networkfs/${USER}/hdfsovernetworkfs/",
      "hdfsovernetworkfs_remove_locks": "yes",
      "rawnetworkfs_path": "/lustre/${USER}/rawnetworkfs/",
      "localstore": "/ssd/${USER}/localstore/",
      "localstore_clear": "yes"
    },
    "spark": {
      "version": "3.5.0-bin-hadoop3",
      "setup_type": "YARN",
      "home": "${HOME}/spark-${SPARK_VERSION}",
      "local_dir": "/tmp/${USER}/spark",
      "worker_cores_per_node": "8",
      "worker_memory_per_node": "16000",
      "worker_directory": "/tmp/${USER}/spark/work",
      "job_memory": "2048",
      "driver_memory": "2048",
      "daemon_heap_max": "1000",
      "environment_extra_path": "${HOME}/spark-my-environment",
      "job": "sparkpi",
      "default_parallelism": "8",
      "memory_fraction": "0.6",
      "memory_storage_fraction": "0.5",
      "storage_memory_fraction": "0.6",
      "shuffle_memory_fraction": "0.2",
      "rdd_compress": "true",
      "io_compression_codec": "lz4",
      "deploy_spreadout": "true",
      "local_scratch_dir": "/lustre/${USER}/sparkscratch/",
      "local_scratch_dir_clear": "yes",
      "network_timeout": "120",
      "yarn_staging_dir": "file:///lustre/${USER}/sparkStaging/",
      "sparkpi_slices": "4",
      "sparkwordcount_file": "file:///path/mywordcountfile",
      "sparkwordcount_copy_in_file": "file:///mywordcountinfile"
    }
  },
  "resource_requirements": {
    "node_count": "<my_node_count>",
    "time_limit": "<my_time_in_hours:minutes>",
    "queue": "<my_queue>",
    "job_name": "<my_job_name>"
  }
}
```
